lead_paragraph: Vic DeLuca was officially appointed Maplewood's mayor and Kathleen Leventhal and Gerard Ryan were sworn in as township committee members for 2010 in a noon, New-Year's-Day reorganization meeting at Town Hall.
snippet: New Year's Day reorganization meeting celebrates Maplewood's community strengths amidst budget woes.
abstract: New Year's Day reorganization meeting celebrates Maplewood's community strengths amidst budget woes.
